name: Two Choices (Guildford Game Jam 2016)
description:
A Guildford Game Jam & Proc Jam game made by Sam Swain.

Built using the Apparance procedural generation engine and tools.

Visit www.apparance.uk for more information.

Follow @ga5p0d3 and @ApparanceUK for development updates.

Email any bugs, questions, or thoughts to sam@apparance.uk

I blogged about the games development at the Guildford Game Jam too.

Thanks for playing

Sam
